completed_features: Initialize the project root by creating the essential configuration files (`package.json`, `tsconfig.json`, `tailwind.config.ts`, `postcss.config.js`, `next.config.js`, `.eslintrc.json`) and the base directory structure (`/app`, `/components`, `/lib`, `/contexts`, `/hooks`, `/types`) as specified in the coding guidelines to establish the development environment.

Create `/types/index.ts` and define the TypeScript interfaces for `Agent`, `Channel`, `Thread`, `Activity`, and `WorkspaceState` exactly as specified in the Technical Specification. Ensure all types are exported and use the specific union types defined (e.g., status strings).
